import React from "react"; import photo from "./stm8blue-pinout.png"; import "./ControlPins.css"; class ControlPins extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { optionValuePD3: "", optionValuePD2: "", optionValuePD1: "", optionValuePC7: "", optionValuePC6: "", optionValuePC5: "", optionValuePC4: "", optionValuePC3: "", optionValuePB4: "", optionValuePB5: "", optionValuePD4: "", optionValuePD5: "", optionValuePD6: "", optionValuePA1: "", optionValuePA2: "", optionValuePA3: "", }; this.handleOptionChange = this.handleOptionChange.bind(this); } handleOptionChange(event) { var pinName = event.target.value.substring(1); switch (pinName) { case "PD3": this.setState({ optionValuePD3: event.target.value }); break; case "PD2": this.setState({ optionValuePD2: event.target.value }); break; case "PD1": this.setState({ optionValuePD1: event.target.value }); break; case "PD6": this.setState({ optionValuePD6: event.target.value }); break; case "PD5": this.setState({ optionValuePD5: event.target.value }); break; case "PD4": this.setState({ optionValuePD4: event.target.value }); break; case "PC7": this.setState({ optionValuePC7: event.target.value }); break; case "PC6": this.setState({ optionValuePC6: event.target.value }); break; case "PC5": this.setState({ optionValuePC5: event.target.value }); break; case "PC4": this.setState({ optionValuePC4: event.target.value }); break; case "PC3": this.setState({ optionValuePC3: event.target.value }); break; case "PB4": this.setState({ optionValuePB4: event.target.value }); break; case "PB5": this.setState({ optionValuePB5: event.target.value }); break; case "PA1": this.setState({ optionValuePA1: event.target.value }); break; case "PA2": this.setState({ optionValuePA2: event.target.value }); break; case "PA3": this.setState({ optionValuePA3: event.target.value }); break; default: } console.log(pinName); } render() { return (

Visual output



); } } export default ControlPins;
